title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4119.6 - Divided interest
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4119.6 - Divided interest

State Regulations

No driver shall drive a horse in a race in which there
shall start another horse that such driver in any way represents or handles or
in which such driver has an interest unless coupled as an
entry. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4119.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
